com.att.research.xacml.api.pep

Class PEPEngineFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.api.pep.PEPEngineFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StdEngineFactory

    public abstract class PEPEngineFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    PEPEngineFactory provides the interface for creating PEPEngine instances.
    Version:
    ${Revision}
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract PEPEngine newEngine()
      Creates a new PEPEngine based on the configured PEPEngineFactory.
      static PEPEngineFactory newInstance()
      Creates a new PEPEngineFactory instance by examining initialization resources from various places to determine the class to instantiate and return.
      static PEPEngineFactory newInstance(java.lang.String factoryClassName)
      Creates a new PEPEngineFactory instance using the given class name and the default thread class loader.
      static PEPEngineFactory newInstance(java.lang.String factoryClassName, java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Creates a new PEPEngineFactory instance using the given class name and ClassLoader.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static PEPEngineFactory newInstance()
                                    throws FactoryException
        Creates a new PEPEngineFactory instance by examining initialization resources from various places to determine the class to instantiate and return.
        Returns:
        an instance of an object that extends PEPEngineFactory to use in creating PEPEngine objects.
        Throws:
        FactoryException

      • newInstance

        public static PEPEngineFactory newInstance(java.lang.String factoryClassName,
                           java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                                    throws FactoryException
        Creates a new PEPEngineFactory instance using the given class name and ClassLoader. If the ClassLoader is null, use the default thread class loader.
        Parameters:
        factoryClassName - the String name of the factory class to instantiate
        classLoader - the ClassLoader to use to load the factory class
        Returns:
        an instance of an object that extends PEPEngineFactory to use in creating PEPEngine objects.
        Throws:
        FactoryException

      • newInstance

                                    throws FactoryException
        Creates a new PEPEngineFactory instance using the given class name and the default thread class loader.
        Parameters:
        factoryClassName - the String name of the factory class to instantiate
        Returns:

        FactoryException

      • newEngine

        public abstract PEPEngine newEngine()
                             throws PEPException
        Creates a new PEPEngine based on the configured PEPEngineFactory.
        Returns:
        a new PEPEngine
        Throws:
        PEPException
